title.rendered: 5 Pathways to Get Permanent Residence in Yukon

content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” top_padding_phone=”15%” bottom_padding_phone=”15%” left_padding_phone=”7%” right_padding_phone=”7%” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”7/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”]
Share Tweet Share Pin
[vc_column_text]“Is it easy to migrate to Yukon and obtain permanent residence?”

Canada’s Yukon province offers many breathtaking landscapes, career possibilities, and business opportunities. Many immigrants move to this northern province each year, seeking to start a new life. These foreigners immigrate to this region after getting Canada PR Visa thanks to the Yukon immigration pathways we are about to discuss.

This guide will examine the five main immigration programs offered by Yukon to obtain permanent residence.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Discover if You Are Eligible for Yukon Immigration” url=”https://bit.ly/start-free-assessment”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”1. YNP Critical Impact Worker Stream” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”apply-for-visitor-visa”][vc_column_text]The Yukon Critical Impact Worker Stream is a unique immigration program that helps Yukon employers find workers from abroad. Such employers have typically demonstrated they could not find Canadians to fill their job positions.

This provincial nominee program caters to foreign workers who work in occupations under the NOC TEER 4 or TEER 5. Workers who get invitations under this program will receive a provincial nomination from the Yukon Government. They can then use this nomination to apply directly for permanent residence with IRCC.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Eligibility” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”get-a-job-offer”][vc_column_text]Prospective applicants must ensure they meet the following requirements before applying for the Critical Impact Worker Stream:

  • Possess a recognized job offer from a Yukon employer
  • Score a minimum language proficiency score of CLB 4
  • Have completed high school
  • Possess six months of work experience in a TEER 4 or TEER 5 Job
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1664196998713{margin-top: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color=”#96001c” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”11099″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Want to Apply for Yukon PR Program?” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Speak with an expert” url=”https://www.elaarimmigration.ca/contact-us/” margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”2. Yukon Skilled Worker Stream” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]The Yukon Skilled Worker Stream is for foreign workers with a valid job offer and skilled work experience in NOC TEER 0, 1, 2 or 3 occupations. Yukon employers typically use this program to fill managerial-level job vacancies Canadians could not fill.

This program’s application process is identical to the Yukon Critical Impact Worker Stream described above.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Eligibility” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Prospective applicants must ensure they meet the following requirements before applying for the Skilled Worker Stream:

  • Possess a recognized job offer from a Yukon employer
  • Score a minimum language proficiency score of CLB 7 if their work experience is under TEER 0 and TEER 1. This requirement is CLB 5 for applicants with TEER 2 and TEER 3 work experience.
  • Have completed high school
  • Possess twelve months of work experience in a TEER 0, 1, 2 or 3 job

You may also like: 7 Practical Tips to Get Job Offer from Outside Canada[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”3. Yukon Express Entry Stream” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1664197012128{margin-top: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_text]The Express Entry system is for skilled workers who possess a full-time job offer from an employer in Yukon. This program works with the Federal Express Entry system. Successful candidates who are nominated by the Yukon will get 600 Bonus CRS points. They can then use these extra points to boost their chance of immigrating through the Express Entry system.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Eligibility” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Prospective applicants must ensure they meet the following requirements before applying for the Yukon Express Entry Stream:

  • Being eligible for any one of the three Federal immigration programs
  • Be part of the Express Entry pool with a valid Express Entry Profile Number
  • Possess a valid job seeker code
  • Possess a valid job offer under TEER 0, 1, 2 or 3 from a Yukon employer
  • Score a minimum language proficiency score of CLB 7 if their work experience is under TEER 0 or TEER 1. This requirement is CLB 5 for applicants with TEER 2 or TEER 3 work experience

Check the Latest Express Entry Draw Results[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1664196194181{margin-top: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_inner tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”1px” column_border_color=”#707070″ column_border_style=”solid”][vc_custom_heading text=”Get Started with Yukon Immigration Program” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Get in touch with us” url=”https://form.jotform.com/222144132258043″ margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”4. Yukon Community Pilot Program” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]The Yukon Community Program (YCP) is a relatively new immigration program designed to attract foreign workers with specific skills and help them settle in certain Yukon communities with labour shortages. Successful candidates will be issued a restricted two-year work permit and can start working in Yukon before applying for permanent residence.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Eligibility” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Prospective applicants must ensure they meet the following requirements before applying for the Yukon Community Pilot Program:

  • Possess two or three valid full-time job offers in the same Yukon community
  • Possess the experience required to complete the job duties
  • Possess a letter of support from the Yukon Government
  • Be eligible for a work permit
[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”5. Yukon Business Nominee Program” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1664197029050{margin-top: 10% !important;}”][vc_column_text]The Yukon Business Nominee Program offers an immigration pathway for entrepreneurs and business owners who wish to operate a business in the province. Successful candidates will receive a two-year work permit and must set up and operate their business according to the Yukon Government’s terms.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Eligibility” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”International Graduate Category” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Prospective applicants must ensure they meet the following requirements before applying for the Yukon Business Nominee Program:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Score a minimum language proficiency score of CLB 4
  • Have completed high school
  • Possess five years of business ownership or senior management experience
  • Have a personal net worth of CAD $500,000 or more
  • Be willing to invest CAD $300,000 or more in the business
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][nectar_btn size=”large” open_new_tab=”true” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”none” text=”Enquire Now” url=”https://form.jotform.com/222144132258043″ margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]If you are interested in moving to Yukon using one of the programs mentioned above, please reach out to a qualified immigration consultant in Whitehorse, Yukon. You can contact our Yukon immigration experts if you are seeking a reliable immigration consultant in Yukon. Elaar Immigration is a full-service immigration firm led by Keshav Sharma, a Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant who has helped numerous people immigrate to Yukon.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”padding-4-percent” column_padding_tablet=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”left-right” top_margin=”5%” column_element_spacing=”30px” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”4/12″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJtbC1mb3JtLWVtYmVkJTIyJTBBJTIwJTIwZGF0YS1hY2NvdW50JTNEJTIyMzgxOTE0NiUzQWIyYzNtMHIxYzklMjIlMEElMjAlMjBkYXRhLWZvcm0lM0QlMjI1NDY1NDI2JTNBdTJ4Mms4JTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_custom_heading text=”Trending Stories” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:26|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1644853159092{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][recent_posts style=”list_featured_first_row” columns=”1″ category=”all” order=”DESC” orderby=”date” image_loading=”default” blog_remove_post_date=”true” blog_remove_post_author=”true” blog_remove_post_comment_number=”true” blog_remove_post_nectar_love=”true” posts_per_page=”5″ post_offset=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Are you planning to move to Yukon, the Land of the Midnight Sun? Here are 5 immigration pathways to obtain Yukon Permanent Residence.
